welcomePage.motto: The Best Way To Manage Your Daily Tasks
welcomePage.kanbanDescription: The Kanban method is based on six basic practices to create an emerging set of positive behaviors in organizations, and achieve better agility in the provision of services.

titles.productivity: Increase the productivity of your team with Boards
titles.rss: Learn Angular with The Rolling Scopes School

productivityList.first: connect boards and visualize all work across your team
productivityList.second: connect your goals to specific high-level deliverables
productivityList.third: achieve full traceability to ensure that everyone keeps their focus
productivityList.fourth: use custom color-coded labels to organize your Kanban cards

customizeList.first: Never miss a task with personalized boards. See what your team is working on and share progress.
customizeList.second: Get a detailed overview of workloads, pin and follow important tasks, choose exactly what you want to see to keep a close eye on progress.

rssList.first: The Rolling Scopes School is free-of-charge and community-based education program conducted by developer community since 2013.
rssList.second: Everyone can study at RS School, regardless of age, professional employment, or place of residence.
